name: Orchid Software
tag_list: intranet, software, extranet, intranet-software, software-development, consultancy, intranet-applications, web-applications
overview:
Orchid Software is an intranet software development house and consultancy based in the North-East of England, UK; the company focuses on the development and provision of its proprietarily-developed Orchidnet intranet software.

Orchidnet is a suite of 90+ intranet applications with an enterprise focus, which includes traditional business processes as well as contemporary social media functionality.

Orchid Software serves a client base including a wide range of companies over diverse sectors including: financial services, retail, publishing, media, manufacturing, healthcare, pharmaceuticals, government agencies, policing and law enforcement, commercial and social housing, educational instituitions, software/tech, logisitics and transport.

Clients include Wyeth UK, Nissan, emap, Sharp, The Royal Academy of Music, Northern Rock, Greggs, Nisa Today’s and Reader’s Digest UK.
